alert.note: Alert for Conway; Faulkner (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 5:49AM CDT until June 14 at 6:30AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Conway County in central Arkansas... Northern Faulkner County in central Arkansas... * Until 630 AM CDT. * At 548 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles northwest of Wooster, or 10 miles northwest of Conway, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Conway... Greenbrier... Vilonia... Wooster... Enola... Twin Groves... Menifee... Mount Vernon... Mallet Town... Pickles Gap... Springhill... Woolly Hollow State Park... Springfield... Holland... Barney... Mt Olive in Conway County... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
